message.content: This question requires basic knowledge about Earth's structure. The mantle refers to the layer of the Earth's interior that lies between the crust and the core. It is a solid layer of rock that makes up the bulk of the Earth's volume. Options (A), (B), and (C) are abstract concepts unrelated to Earth's structure.
